storyInfo: To help the Abyssal Hunters recover quickly, Advisor Blandus once more performs surgery on them after many years, but the Church attacks soon after. Meanwhile, Secunda encounters Ulpianus outside the data scientist's refuge. The scientist left behind some final clues, but had already become a Seaborn.

attributes.content: Reassessing. Biological safety of operating theater now at permitted levels.
attributes.name: 'Little Handy'

attributes.content: Surgery may begin at any time.
attributes.name: 'Little Handy'

attributes.content: Hunters, just as before, you will be kept in a deep sleep during the automated surgery.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: I will also be manually repairing your outdated internal auto-adaptive junctions.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: This room filled to the brim with specimens, and these lab tables are all rather familiar. How long has it been since we last laid down in such an environment?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Five years, Laurentina.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: I should really be waiting for your medulla replacement surgery to finish and your cell-Originium assimilation rate to stabilize before I handle any of your Hunter-related issues.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: But time is short, and I have no choice but to restore you to stable condition to the best of my abilities.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: My apologies, Laurentina.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Sentimental as always.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Ah, right, as usual...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: A candle will be lit by your side, so our little mermaid won't look so pale while she sleeps. I've asked my staff to prepare it for you.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: I knew you'd remember.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Please maintain a comfortable position and stay still while the regen gel fills.
attributes.name: 'Little Handy'

attributes.content: This isn't so different from back then. Except there's a lot less Hunters now.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Clear a trench of scum, close your eyes, listen to some advisor prattle on, then sink into the regen gel and take a nap.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: And once you wake up, all the nauseating smells left on your body will be gone without a trace.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: While you were in the adverse, fickle environments of the land for long periods without care, your bodies became extremely unstable.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: The auto-adaptive junction can monitor your Seaborn genes, but five years of wear can render even the most precise instruments dull.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Moreover, your immune systems have also fallen into disorder thanks to their long struggle against the Seaborn genes.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: I will do my best to restore you all to peak condition, but anything lost during those five years is out of my hands.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Gladiia, our reunion at the tribunal was less than cordial, so I would have liked for us to consider this our first meeting since your return.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: But you haven't said a word since we started.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Is there anything else you need to tell us in regards to the surgery, Blandus?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: If not, then save it for after the procedure. We can discuss the changes we've felt over the past five years, as well as the changes you've felt.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Please stay still. Anesthetic procedures will begin in ten seconds.
attributes.name: 'Little Handy'

attributes.content: Well then. Sweet dreams, Hunters.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Advisor Blandus, some things have come up that need your reconfirmation.
Did I not say that once the operating theater doors have closed, I would be mending the Hunters' auto-adaptive junctions and must not be disturbed?
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Central Control has discovered some abnormalities. You should personally check them over, just to be safe.
...Hold on then. I'll get the door.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: The monitoring units in the dome were performing an emergency scan. We noticed a concentration of algal bio-signatures here.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Thanks for informing me.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Not a problem.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Since you're already participating in Tullia's case, there was no reason to cut you out partway.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: A place where the dome and the ground meet... This former experimental field for road-side coral.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Though it can't compare to the specialized setups at the Institute of Ecological Art, it's much better for seaweed breeding than small-scale hydroponic tanks in a room.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Whether it be in her nature, or out of an ulterior motive, Tullia did not apply for authorization to use this space. She found it on her own, without telling anyone.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Tullia...
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: We can't say for sure if there is a Church hideout here, or if Tullia is still within... In short, stay alert.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Team 1 has already formed a defensive perimeter around the neighborhood, and will monitor the roads. Irene, go with Team 2. Enter via surface roads.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: As for the roads connecting the dome and the mezzanine, leave them to me.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Move out.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Who's there?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Have you found something, Praefecta Secunda? Do you need reinforcements?
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Somebody blocks her path. Or more precisely, prevents her from leaving.
The one in her way lurks in the shadows formed by the angles of the buildings, their entire body blending into the darkness save their eyes. Eyes that Secunda are all too familiar with.
...Stick to the plan.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Secunda cuts her comms.
...It's been a while, 'Magister.'
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Blandus, the weapons technology advisor for the Waterway Program, and an expert in Class IV weapon R&D, correct?
attributes.name: 'Researcher A'

attributes.content: ...You're not from the lab.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: No sudden moves. If the bristles of this longbeard combtooth grass pierce your skin, you'll quickly fall into a tormented dream, where you'll sense your consciousness being slowly torn apart.
attributes.name: 'Researcher A'

attributes.content: The variety used for euthanasia has been bred to be milder, but wild ones are still plenty cruel.
attributes.name: 'Researcher A'

attributes.content: You may look half-dead, but I know for a fact that you're the sort who really cares how they die.
attributes.name: 'Researcher A'

attributes.content: Church of the Deep?
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Don't you dare touch the anesthetized Hunters!
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: What an odd fellow. Even as your life is threatened, you think of them first?
attributes.name: 'Researcher A'

attributes.content: You may care for the Hunters, but you've never trusted the Abyssal Hunter project itself. You question its rationale, its damage to the nature of humanity, and all the sacrifice it requires.
attributes.name: 'Researcher B'

attributes.content: You took part in it, but only so you could personally control all the risks entailed.
attributes.name: 'Researcher B'

attributes.content: You experienced its demise firsthand; saw the extensive project, interlinked with so many others, come to a hasty end after an uncertain failure.
attributes.name: 'Researcher B'

attributes.content: So I doubt you'd want to send these survivors, freshly returned to Ægir, back onto the battlefield.
attributes.name: 'Researcher B'

attributes.content: No, you don't understand. What I do is only to protect them from further harm.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: So why not halt the procedure? Stop them from joining the battle for the Waterway Program?
attributes.name: 'Researcher B'

attributes.content: The surgery is fully automated, I can't just stop it.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Sever the oxygen pipeline below the operating table, and it'll cut the procedure short. Don't think we don't know that.
attributes.name: 'Researcher A'

attributes.content: If you won't do it, we can do it for you.
attributes.name: 'Researcher A'

attributes.content: After you finish 'handling' the Hunters, Advisor, come take a walk with us. Explain the principles behind the Class IV weapons, as well as how to shut them down.
attributes.name: 'Researcher B'

attributes.content: Stop! If the operation is forcibly terminated, the Hunters will be irreversibly harmed—
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Scum.
The 'researcher' stops in his tracks. He dares not step forward, yet dares not move back, for a lance has pierced his torso, his blood dripping down its shaft.
If you do not wish me to ram this straight through your chest, let go of your hand.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Don't ask pointless questions, Secunda.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You're investigating Tullia, too. Did you find anything?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She is simply an ordinary data scientist who got caught up in this. She discovered something she shouldn't have. Attempted to warn the authorities, but failed.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You were too slow. What she encountered has nothing to do with her past.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The battle outside the city, the abnormalities within, the Sea Patrol staying uninvolved with the Waterway Program. You've noticed many oddities, yet at the same time, your attention was so easily diverted.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You mean... Cassia?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Precisely.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You were once so focused, and keen as well.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: So the day you decided to leave the Abyssal Hunter Lab to join the Sea Patrol, I believed you had reflected upon yourself and chosen a more suitable path.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: It seems that was not the only time you have allowed emotion to cloud your decisions.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: ...Aside from your clothes, you haven't changed a bit in five years. Especially not how you talk.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Whether as a researcher or a Hunter, you'd never refuse to hear a student's questions, but would refuse to answer if you thought the question itself was wrong.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: There are no worthless answers. Their worth lies in the questions.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Questions are the most effective means of tempering your thoughts, and your questions were always most pointed, Secunda.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Then there should be no fault with my original question. What are you doing here, Ulpianus?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: This is the scene of a Sea Patrol investigation. A fugitive Abyssal Hunter like you should be laying down his anchor and making clear his position.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Gladiia and the others have proven an effective force in the battle for the Waterway Program, while despite also surviving, you chose to return to Milliarium like this.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: ...That's more than enough grounds to attack you.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Their return will only make the situation more volatile. Even through Tullia's case, it's clear that the so-called 'Waterway Program' is riddled with issues.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Ægir has learned nothing from the failure of the Abyssal Hunter project.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: What are you going to do?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Prevent this nation from sliding into the abyss.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I'd say you're looking awfully like our enemy now, though.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Doubt me as you will, Secunda.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: (Shrill crying)
What's happening in there?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: A ordinary Ægir, doing all she can.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: But Ægir will no longer show her any respect.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Who're you—?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Irene...
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Ulpianus?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Nobody responds. The Hunter has already faded into the shadows.
What the—?! Why aren't you asleep?!
attributes.name: 'Researcher B'

attributes.content: I'm not the only one.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Hello. I suggest moving the hand carrying that whatever-grass away from the advisor's neck.

attributes.name: 'Researcher A'
attributes.content: You—

attributes.name: 'Researcher A'
attributes.content: Arghhh—!
A fair hand tightly grips the plant held by the 'researcher,' its glistening tentacles struggling fiercely as they are nipped off one by one.
I told you to move it away.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The real researchers are in the instrument recycling room, probably injected with paralytics. They won't wake up for a while.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I also took care of the goons in the corridor.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Did you leave any alive for questioning?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: They won't die before the Sea Patrol takes them away, at least.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Gladiia, Laurentina, Skadi...
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Blandus stands in the center of the operating theater. The Hunters step towards him, over the intruders lying flat on the ground.
They do not lower their weapons.
Not going to explain the trick you played with the regen gel, advisor?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: *sigh* My dearest Blandus, just to be clear, we are no fortune tellers.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Swordfish thought something was off from the start.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: We've undergone hundreds of surgeries. We've probably spent more time sleeping in gels than in our beds.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: You should know that even if the operation failed to restore us to our full potential, we would still have returned to the battlefield.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: As I told Ulpianus when he came to me, all I wanted was for the participants of this program to live like normal people again someday.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: I wished for my fellow people, who'd come from all walks of life, to have the chance to finally return to their former lives.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Skadi could continue her life of wandering, hammering away at complex lighting arrays while taking pictures of the seabed nobody else would understand.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Laurentina's skills could let her become the next shining star of the Institute of Physical Art.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: We could watch the graceful stars projected across the dome, while she dances alongside the meteors in the Sophontheatrum.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Or perhaps we would find her works on the street corners of each and every city.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Flavius, the seaweed breeding technician. Nona, the songwriter. Lunia, the exotic organism researcher. And Celsus, the youngest ever scientific exploration fleet commander.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: We both still remember the names of all these Hunters, Gladiia. We've both had our fill of sacrifice.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: This is far from the first time I've heard this little cliché of yours.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Your feebleness and stupidity are already enough to earn you a death by my lance.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Luckily for you, those Church scum arrived at just the right time to save your hide.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Are you saying their actions have coincidentally proven my innocence?
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: That's not what I wanted, Gladiia.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: What I must do will not change.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Your innocence is of little relevance.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: My point was that by choosing to expose themselves now, risking everything to stop us Hunters from rejoining the battle, and even holding an advisor hostage...
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: All it shows is how effective the deployment of the Waterway Program has been.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Blandus, weapons technology advisor of the Waterway Program. Abandon your little tricks, complete our surgery, then return to your original post.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Clementia's orders are that once Nest 37 has been successfully marked, the Class IV weapons are to immediately strike against all nests by the Waterway.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The Church is grasping at straws. As one can surmise from what those dregs were talking about earlier, they will not stop.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The Abyssal Hunter project no longer exists, Blandus. If sentimentality clouds your mind and renders you feeble, tear it out. Forget it.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Gladiia.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: You're the same as ever. No, even stricter with yourself.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: What I ask of myself has no bearing here.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Just yesterday, out of two entire fleets, we were only able to save twenty-six people from the Seaborn encirclement.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Before we entered this old lab, I had just learned that those twenty-six legionnaires had already applied for positions in the newly-drawn army.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: War is never-ending, and no soldier can tear themselves away from the battlefield. That's all it is. Nothing more.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: ...Seaborn.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Where dome and ground meet, an entire wall is covered in remodeled hydroponic tanks. Various species of seaweed grow wildly, and several large clusters have already begun to grow out of their tanks.
Separated by a transparent wall, they face the gloomy seawater.
(Muffled cry)
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: A lone Seaborn wanders about, like a lost spirit.
Its tentacles are tightly wound around a transparent container, and the rest of its body shakes and sways as it drags itself towards the tanks.
(This clumsy posture...)
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: (As though it's unaccustomed to its body...)
attributes.name: Irene
Irene
attributes.content: Are you...

attributes.name: Irene
attributes.content: Tullia?

attributes.name: Seaborn
attributes.content: Tu—lli—a...
You can still speak. You still have your humanity. Tell me, what happened to you?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Left... and returned...
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Data. Someone used... Waterway, signal...
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: I told, her. But she...
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Told who?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Ocean... Fall into—ocean.
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: City left. You. They're still... here...
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: *whimper* So far...
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Give her some space, Irene. The Seaborn cells have completely transformed her body. Her mind is near the point of no return.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: We've handled similar transformations. This stage in Seaborn degeneration is extremely unstable. It's far beyond the point where we can provide palliative care.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: You sure took your time.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: I ran into something.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: We've been misled.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Someone deliberately engendered suspicions regarding the scientist's past and her motives for joining the Waterway Program. It's led the investigation astray.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: You mean that woman from the Institute of Facility Management.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: That's right. Cassia. Once we're finished here, the Sea Patrol will inform the Institute of Facility Management and arrest her.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Tullia noticed occasional abnormalities in the signaling system and told a friend, possibly Cassia. She exposed herself to the Church.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She'd have been chased towards the fringes of the city, where she fell into a drain and was carried out to sea by the city's circulatory system.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Do you remember how we found pieces of biological tissue on our excursion outside? Crossing between two anchorage points without equipment is far beyond the limits of the human form.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: So in her desperation to return to the city...
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She ate that strange flesh.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: (Muffled, indistinct murmuring)
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: What's that she's holding?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Plant nutrient fluid.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Her consciousness should be gone by now. Don't tell me she returned to the city just for these... seaweeds?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: 'These primitive seaweeds are some of the simplest, yet most tenacious lifeforms in the entire ocean.'
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: 'Whether in bright shallow seas, the dark abyss, the flat sea floor, or cracks in the cliffs, they stretch out as best they can.'
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: 'And they're as old as the ocean itself, pretty much this planet's living fossils.'
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: (Violent shudder)
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: (Pained wail)
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: The Seaborn suddenly stops, as though it has just noticed something. Its tentacles recklessly thrash about, and the transparent container tumbles from its grasp, spilling nutrient fluid all over the floor.
Bio-monitor readings increasing rapidly! Her transformation is accelerating!
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Why did she suddenly stop? Did something happen?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Irene walks in front of the Seaborn.
As she passes by the glass of the hydroponic tanks, she sees her own face.
Yes. I believe... she saw what she had become.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: ...A data scientist, yet also a woman as simple as the seaweeds she cultivates.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She chose to stay, or perhaps knew that following the Institute of Ecological Art to another city would not truly have helped these seaweeds as they gradually lose their place out in the wild ocean.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: But now... she has become one of the pollutants threatening them herself.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Irene closes her eyes.
She never knew this Ægir woman who loved seaweeds. She's only ever seen her image in the Little Handy. And now, before their first meeting, she's already become the Seaborn she sees before her.
Whether by rapier or handcannon, she should end its life.
I believe she can no longer answer our questions.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: It seems you're familiar with this sort of thing.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I once heard a Seaborn play a broken song aboard a ship.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: I apologize for underestimating you earlier, Irene.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: The land and the sea are connected. You may not have experienced the frontlines of the Seaborn conflict, but you've witnessed both what has changed and what has not, equal in their weight and cruelty.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: But for now, let me handle this.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She is an Ægir.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Irene sees Secunda walk past her side, stopping in front of the Seaborn.
The expressionless Praefecta places her shield between the Seaborn and the wall covered in tanks, then raises her weapon at the once-woman.
(Wails)
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Her journey ended♪
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Her home close at hand♪
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: This song...
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: She chose this place to sleep.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: The Seaborn collapses to the floor. The commander's shield blocks its spurting bodily fluids from entering the hydroponic tanks.
The seaweeds sway, quietly respirating.
